#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
#include<math.h>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int test,n,s,m,p,q,index1,index2,i,cnt,diff;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
        scanf("%d %d %d %d %d",&n,&m,&s,&p,&q);
        cnt = 0;
        index1 = 1;
        index2 = 1;
        for(i=0;i<s;i++)
        {
            index1 += p;
            index2 += q;
            while(index1>n)
            {
                if(index1>n)
                {
                    diff = index1 - n;
                    diff--;
                    index1 = m + diff;
                }
            }
            while(index2>n)
            {
                if(index2>n)
                {
                    diff = index2 - n;
                    diff--;
                    index2 = m+ diff;
                }
            }
            if(index1==index2)
                cnt++;
        }
        printf("%d\n",cnt);
    }
    return 0;
}
